name: Returner Zhero
description:
Fantastic, yes is an indie game studio based out of Copenhagen, Denmark
Find out more at fantasticyes.com and returnerthegame.com
Follow us on twitter: @fantasticyes3D

Compatible with iPhone 6s/iPad Air 2 or newer devices

If you need help or have any questions please send us a message at support@fantasticyes.com

If you like Returner Zhero try our other standalone adventure in the Returner series, "Returner 77" on the App Store
